item.title: Added Viezly - code review tool
item.description: https://viezly.com/ - Enhanced code review tool for easier code reading and navigation. Free for Open Source and free for personal usage.

item.title: Update link to point to product page
item.description: https://lean20.com/product/status/ - Public status pages for incident reporting. 100% free.

item.title: Adding Lean20 Status Pages to monitoring tools
item.description: https://lean20.com - Public status pages for incident reporting. 100% free.

item.title: dropped Beta from Eva Beta
item.description: https://eva.pingutil.com - Verify 5 million emails per day for free using REST API. No sign-ups required.

item.title: Added 4 new entries under Email section
item.description:
https://www.antideo.com - 10 API requests per hour for email verification, IP and phone number validation in free tier. No Credit Cards required.
https://eva.pingutil.com - — Verify 5 million emails per day for free using REST API. No sign-ups required.
https://quickemailverification.com - Verify 100 emails daily for free on a free tier along with other free APIs like DEA Detector, DNS Lookup, SPF Detector and more.
https://hottempmail.com/ - Unlimited free temp email or disposable temporary email addresses. Autoexpires in one day.
https://temp-mail.org - Temporary, secure, anonymous, free, disposable email address with REST API for fetching 100 emails from its disposable mailbox per day for free.

item.title: Added 450 results limit
item.description: https://github.com/marketplace/testspace-com - A Dashboard for publishing automated test results and a Framework for implementing manual tests as code using GitHub. The service is [free for Open Source](https://github.com/marketplace/testspace-com) accounts for 450 results per month.

item.title: Added telegram, discordapp.com moved to discord.com
item.description:
https://discord.com/ - Chat with public/private rooms. Markdown text, voice, video, and screen sharing capabilities. Free for unlimited users.
https://telegram.org/ - Telegram is for everyone who wants fast and reliable messaging and calls. Business users and small teams may like the large groups, usernames, desktop apps and powerful file sharing options.

item.title: Adding testspace.com Test Management tool.
item.description: https://github.com/marketplace/testspace-com - Dashboard for publishing automated test results and a Framework for implementing manual tests as code using GitHub. [Free for Open Source](https://github.com/marketplace/testspace-com).

item.title: Added asayer.io - open-source session replay
item.description: https://asayer.io/pricing.html) — Hosted version of openreplay, an open-source session replay (alternative to FullStory and LogRocket - Hosted version of openreplay, an open-source session replay (alternative to FullStory and LogRocket). Free 1k sessions/month with 14 days retention

item.title: Added smalldev.tools - a handy tools for developer
item.description: https://smalldev.tools/ - A free tool for developers that allows you to Encode/Decode various formats, Minify HTML/CSS/Javascript, Beautify, Generate Fake/Testing real like dataset in JSON/CSV & multiple other formats and many more features. With a delightful interface.
